meanings.definition: A covering for the head made of real or artificial hair.
meanings.sent1: She wore a fancy wig to the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The actor's wig looked very realistic on stage.
meanings.sent3: The wig flew off her head when she jumped in surprise.
meanings.sent4: His wig of confidence never slipped, even in tough situations.
meanings.sent5: The wig's color was so vibrant, it caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: He tends to wig out when things don't go his way.
meanings.sent2: She wigs every time someone touches her belongings.
meanings.sent3: Don't wig over a small mistake; it's not worth it.
meanings.sent4: She wigs like a volcano erupting when she's angry.
meanings.sent5: His boss wigs at the slightest inconvenience, making everyone nervous.
